      • allBoxesValid

        boolean allBoxesValid​(SimpleBoard b)
        Check if all boxes are valid. Return boolean. Differentiate between normal Sudokus (Normal, Samurai) and Freeform Sudokus. To do so get the groupID of three Random Positions from the board.
        Parameters:
        b - the b
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • solve

        public SimpleBoard solve​(SimpleBoard part)
        Solver for all boards. 1. Use a counter to stop in case of an endless loop. 2. Return null if the current board isn't valid. 3. Return the board if the current board is valid and full. 4. Enter the solve algorithm. Brute force attempt. If a cell is empty add numbers from 1-9 and start recursion with the added cell. TODO: Problem with Freeform Sudokus with a low number input. Solver cannot solve Freeform with less than ~40% of the cells filled.
        Parameters:
        part - the current board
        Returns:
        the simple board
